call_title: Ergo PoW Dev Update Feb 24th 2025 |  Wallet, Node, Reputation, Mining, Rosen Bridge, and more!

decisions.decision: Oracle reward tokens will be DORT (Dollar Oracle Reward Tokens) instead of GORT
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Clarification on SigmaUSD Oracle pool version 2 reward tokens
decisions.quote: I said last week that won't be GORT as in Gold Oracle Reward Tokens, it's going to be Dollar Oracle Reward Tokens, which is DORT
